tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.22
tool.description: Grids from classified grid and table
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayID_FIELD False isArrayCLASSES False output_data_GRIDS $output_data_GRIDS name SAGA.grid_tools.22 TABLE $TABLE ID_FIELD $ID_FIELD CLASSES $CLASSES prefer $prefer response $response outputType_GRIDS $OutputSection_GRIDS.outputType_GRIDS transmissionMode_GRIDS $OutputSection_GRIDS.transmissionMode_GRIDS

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: The table with the (numeric) data values for each class. The tool creates a grid for each table column (besides the ID). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ID_FIELD
param.label: Attribute
param.help: The attribute with the class IDs, used to link the table and the grid. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: CLASSES
param.label: Classes
param.help: The grid coded with the class IDs. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_GRIDS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_GRIDS
param.label: Grids
param.help: The output grids, one grid for each table column.

tool.help: Creates several grids using a classified grid and a table with data values for each class.
